snippet.title: Nocturnals - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Nocturnals to your wishlist! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2578910/Nocturnals/

Nocturnals is a narrative-driven adventure game following Ted and his newfound companion Diego as they work together to survive in a lonely post-apocalyptic world.

Navigate the eerie town of Ruddleside, solving puzzles, facing conflict, and making tough choices that will shape the relationship between Ted and Diego, as well as the outcome of their journey.

Ted and Diego are characters inspired by myself and my partner, who has lent a hand with development, and I wanted to capture the memory of our relationship in our favorite medium.
